fullText: This is a dazzling spectacle that will leave you breathless, even if it doesn't always leave you humming.
dtliExcerpt: This is a dazzling spectacle that will leave you breathless, even if it doesn't always leave you humming.
bwwExcerpt: For its new stage musical "Frozen," Disney should've heeded the sage advice of Queen Elsa: Let it go. Broadway should be the place to see what you can do, to test the limits and break through. No right, no wrong, no rules for thee - you're free! But that's wishful thinking. With "Frozen," the House of Mouse doesn't let us in, doesn't let us see. Stays the good Mouse it always has to be. Conceals, doesn't feel. Doesn't let us know. Well, here's what I know: "Frozen" is not a very good show.
